2024. On March 11, the representative of the
People's Procuracy of Tay Ninh province handed over
more than 2.57 billion VND in compensation to Mr.
Nguyen Van Dung, also known as  Mr. Little Dung, 63
years old, woke up in Binh Duong after 45 years of being
wrongly accused according to the content of the case in July 1979.
Mr. Little Dung and three family members
were arrested on suspicion of being involved
in the gold robbery in Trang Bang.
The beaten bullies were forced to
confess and were unjustly imprisoned. One
day in May 1983, dozens of people were identified as
not participating in the robbery. The
People's Procuracy of Tay Ninh province issued a decision to
suspend the investigation and prosecution.  Tay Ninh province police
released at that time only one person was
compensated. It was not until October
2019, after 40 years, that the People's Procuracy of
Tay Ninh province organized a public apology. The
remaining victims were graved the following year.
People with onai were compensated with a total
amount of more than 6 billion VND. Mr. Dung Nho, however, did
not agree with the compensation amount of more than 1 billion
VND, so he sued the People's Procuracy of
province T
after the People's Court's appeal.
High-ranking officials in Ho Chi Minh City have
requested the People's Procuracy of Tay Ninh province to
compensate Mr. Dung according to the
state compensation liability law

Ninh Hoa commune, Van Ninh district of Khanh
Hoa province has started harvesting this year's snail shells
because the selling price of Huong brains has increased slightly, so
farmers are also
excited. These days, many snail farming sites
in Khanh Hoa have started harvesting to
supply.  Providing the market after Tet this year,
harvesting snails is very fast and requires little
labor because farm owners rent
very compact harvesting machines, for example,
each farm is nearly 1 hectare wide and only needs to hire
about 10 workers to shorten the time.
Harvesting time is down to 2 hours instead of a whole
day like manual harvesting
in the past. Currently, the selling price of snails has increased
slightly to nearly 250,000 VND per kg depending on the
size of the snails after being harvested for
consumption.  In the province and some neighboring places
such as Phu Yen, Dak Lak, farmers said that in the
coming time, the price of Huong snails is expected to
increase sharply due to the increasing consumption market
and the area of ​​Huong snail farming ponds
in Khanh Hoa is still limited.

This is the first procedure in the process of

said the government will take mitigation measures

work before the administrative procedures to
determine their licenses are completed.
The ministry also opened a hotline to
receive  those who want to return to
work, the strike began on
February 20 to protest
the government's decision to increase the medical enrollment target
as of March 8, totaling
nearly 12,000 interns and outstanding doctors.
Residents in hospitals account for about 93 of the
doctors who have left their workplaces,
while in recent days many
students at 10 medical schools in Korea have
not gone to school to express their protest against the
government's decision.  In addition, the
remaining 30 medical schools in the country
panicked and opened the
new semester on March 11.
